externalCapacity.title: hasExternalCapacity
externalCapacity.tooltipDescription: The package use at least one Node.js dependency capable to communicate outside or to establish a listening server.

warnings.title: hasWarnings
warnings.tooltipDescription: The AST analysis has detected warnings (suspect import, unsafe regex ..)

nativeCode.title: hasNativeCode
nativeCode.tooltipDescription: The package use native components (package, file, configuration).

customResolver.title: hasCustomResolver
customResolver.tooltipDescription: The package has dependencies that are not packages.

noLicense.title: hasNoLicense
noLicense.tooltipDescription: The package does not seem to have a license.

multipleLicense.title: hasMultipleLicenses
multipleLicense.tooltipDescription: The package has multiple licenses in multiple files

minifiedCode.title: hasMinifiedCode
minifiedCode.tooltipDescription: The package seems to have files that are minified/uglified.

isGit.title: isGit
isGit.tooltipDescription: The package (project) is a git repository

vulnerabilities.title: vulnerabilities
vulnerabilities.tooltipDescription: The package have one or many vulnerabilities.

missingOrUnusedDependency.title: hasMissingOrUnusedDependency
missingOrUnusedDependency.tooltipDescription: A dependency is missing in package.json or a dependency is installed but never used!

isDead.title: isDead
isDead.tooltipDescription: The dependency has not received update from at least one year!

bannedFile.title: hasBannedFile
bannedFile.tooltipDescription: The project has at least one sensitive file.

outdated.title: isOutdated
outdated.tooltipDescription: The current package version is not equal to the package latest version!
